alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:28PM CDT until May 12 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KINGFISHER AND NORTH CENTRAL CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Kingfisher, moving northeast at 15 mph. Tennis ball sized hail has been reported 2 miles north of Okarche. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingfisher, Okarche, and Cashion. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
